subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Of all the distinctive wrinkles of Oakmont, the home of this week’s U.S. Open, the club’s Church Pews bunker between the third and fourth holes have come to represent the course’s toughness, charm and eclectic soul.
snippet: Of all the distinctive wrinkles of Oakmont, the home of this week’s U.S. Open, the club’s Church Pews bunker between the third and fourth holes have come to represent the course’s toughness, charm and eclectic soul.
